question: tomorrow I'll be 32 weeks and have another ultrasound it feels like months since we had one.. and due to gd and SPD and our stay in the hospital yesterday to stop preterm labor, we will find out according to the babies size when our induction date will be if he doesn't come on his own. either 37, 38 or 39 weeks. hoping 37 cause this pregnancy has been so hard and having diabetes and the preterm labor scares ....I'm just ready to not be pregnant and meet my third baby boy !!
title: 32 week ultrasound tmw and induction date !
